Class QueueController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<QueueView>
musicApp.controllers.SongContainerController<QueueView>
musicApp.controllers.QueueController
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueueView.QueueViewListener, SongContainerView.SongContainerViewListener
public class QueueController extends SongContainerController<QueueView> implements QueueView.QueueViewListener
Controller responsible for managing the song queue view and logic. Handles adding, removing, reordering, and playing songs in the queue.

  • Field Summary
